articles.description: As the pandemic gripped the world, global vaccine makers led the battle against the virus. For Indian firms, it was only the beginning of a volley of challenges. Even as they managed to dole out millions of jabs, allegations flew thick and fast. However, with…

articles.author: Faizan Haidar
articles.title: Max group to exit packaging films business, to focus on real estate - Economic Times
articles.description: “We have so far focused on commercial development but we will now enter the residential segment and are in final stages of acquiring three land parcels,” said a company source. The company will also change its name from MaxVIL to Max Estates ltd.
articles.content: Max Ventures & Industries Limited (), a Max Group company that manages real estate businesses in NCR as well as a Specialty Packaging Films company, has decided to exit the packaging films busine… [+3745 chars]
